NAME: SCUMM Data File MD5 Checksums
DESC: This page lists MD5 checksums for various 'canonical' data files of SCUMM games, which can be used to identify game versions/variants.

br.p: All the MD5 checksums listed below are computed for the canonic "first" file of each game. This is usually a file like "00.lfl", "000.lfl", "*.000", "*.la0", "*.he0" etc.

If you have data files not listed here, or if the MD5 of your data files differs from the values listed here, please drop us a note so we can update the table. Email us at scummvm-devel AT lists DOT sourceforge DOT net.

Note: If a game appears here, this does not imply that it is officially supported by ScummVM or even playable. If you want to find out whether a game is supported, please consult the <a href="/compatibility.php">compatibility page.
